text: Brian Boland (26 July 1931 – 20 April 2012) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Richmond and Hawthorn in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1931 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Richmond Football Club players Category:Hawthorn Football Club players
title: Brian Boland (footballer)
